last_episode_to_air.name: There Goes the Bride (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Having lost their lead, Agatha and the gang return to the list of suspects. Could Eirwen’s death be linked to the family business? Or were her two prior fiancés involved?

name: Agatha Raisin
overview: Burnt out on office politics, Agatha Raisin retires early to a picturesque village in the Cotswolds and soon finds a second career as an amateur detective investigating mischief, mayhem, and murder in her deceptively quaint town.

episodes.name: The Walkers of Dembley
episodes.overview: A walker is found dead on a local baronet's land soon after he declares war on her rambling group for trespassing on his land. Eager to solve the crime, Agatha convinces James that they should pose as a married couple and go undercover in the victim's walking group.

episodes.name: Hell's Bells
episodes.overview: Bell-ringer Amanda Ballard is found hanged in the belfry with a suicide note left beside her, but Agatha is not convinced she took her own life and enlists a reluctant Roy to help her research the case.

episodes.name: The Wellspring of Death
episodes.overview: Roy lures Agatha back into the world of PR. She represents a local mineral water company -- but a murder there throws a spanner in the works.

episodes.name: The Potted Gardener
episodes.overview: Agatha springs into action when James's girlfriend Mary is found dead shortly before the village gardening competition.

episodes.name: The Vicious Vet
episodes.overview: Agatha and James spring into action when the local vet and village heartthrob is found dead, the day after he and Agatha went on a date.

episodes.name: The Day the Floods Came
episodes.overview: The murder of a bride throws the village into shock. Ignoring warnings Agatha investigates, but soon finds she's in desperate danger.

episodes.name: Witch of Wyckhadden
episodes.overview: Love is in the air for Agatha, but when a local mystic is found bludgeoned to death, she becomes embroiled in a most mysterious case.

episodes.name: Murderous Marriage
episodes.overview: The Murderous Marriage: When Agatha's first husband is found dead in a ditch the day after stopping her wedding to James, she must race to prove her innocence.

episodes.name: Agatha Raisin and the Wizard of Evesham
episodes.overview: Now back in her quaint Cotswolds hamlet, Agatha suspects her hair salon's arrogant stylist is blackmailing clients with their darkest secrets.

episodes.name: Agatha Raisin and the Fairies of Fryfam
episodes.overview: Looking to get away for a few days, Agatha rents a cottage in Fryfam, a village where mythical fairies are said to live. Before Agatha can start relaxing, however, she is employed by a local woman to prove that her wealthy husband is having an affair.

episodes.name: Agatha Raisin and the Curious Curate
episodes.overview: The arrival of a handsome new curate causes a stir in the village, but when murder strikes, one of Agatha's friends becomes the prime suspect. As she works to clear her friend's name, Agatha's love life gets in the way of her investigation.

episodes.name: Agatha Raisin & the Haunted House
episodes.overview: Agatha opens her own detective agency, but potential clients aren't exactly breaking down the door of her new office. In search of new business, Agatha and James visit Ivy Hall, a house said to be haunted since the English Civil War. Are the strange sounds and unexplained footsteps heard at night truly supernatural, or is someone trying to scare the obnoxious owner out of her home?

episodes.name: Agatha Raisin & the Deadly Dance (Part 1)
episodes.overview: A scathing article in the paper harms Agatha's business, until Charles's wealthy friend hires the agency to investigate death threats against her daughter. After disaster strikes the daughter's engagement party, Agatha enrolls in dance lessons to try to outmaneuver the culprit.

episodes.name: Agatha Raisin & the Deadly Dance (Part 2)
episodes.overview: The case grows more complex when a would-be assassin dies in Agatha's kitchen, but who was the target: him or Agatha? Toni continues her search for the missing dog, and Charles and Roy pull an all-nighter in the pub.

episodes.name: Agatha Raisin & the Love From Hell (Part 1)
episodes.overview: James vanishes after a blazing row with Agatha in a pub; leaving behind only a trail of blood and a dead body, everyone is left fearing the worst.

episodes.name: Agatha Raisin & the Love From Hell (Part 2)
episodes.overview: James vanishes after a blazing row with Agatha in a pub; leaving behind only a trail of blood and a dead body, everyone is left fearing the worst.

episodes.name: Agatha Raisin & the Pig That Turned (Part 1)
episodes.overview: Agatha takes a relaxing trip to a traditional winter festival with her team to temporarily leave her troubles behind, but her plans are quickly derailed when a gruesome discovery leaves all of Carsely in the Cotswolds fearing for their safety.

episodes.name: Agatha Raisin & the Pig That Turned (Part 2)
episodes.overview: Agatha takes a relaxing trip to a traditional winter festival with her team to temporarily leave her troubles behind, but her plans are quickly derailed when a gruesome discovery leaves all of Carsely in the Cotswolds fearing for their safety.

episodes.name: Kissing Christmas Goodbye
episodes.overview: Agatha's in need of a well-earned break and with Christmas just around the corner it looks like the perfect opportunity to relax. When she receives a letter from an old lady begging for protection, she can't help but spring into action.

episodes.name: Love, Lies, and Liquor (1)
episodes.overview: When James whisks Agatha away on a seaside trip to work on his new book, the last thing she expects is to end up in Snoth-on-Sea-and be suspected of murder.

episodes.name: Love, Lies, and Liquor (2)
episodes.overview: Agatha begins to make connections between the killings and the long-ago robbery. But can she unravel the puzzle before another life is lost?

episodes.name: A Spoonful of Poison (1)
episodes.overview: DCI Wilkes hires Agatha to investigate a mysterious death at a jam-making festival, when one of the judges for an event he was competing in plunges from a rooftop.

episodes.name: A Spoonful of Poison (2)
episodes.overview: The police believe the latest death was an accident, but Agatha uncovers a possible connection to an earlier tragedy that may shine light on the motive in this case.

episodes.name: There Goes the Bride (1)
episodes.overview: It’s the wedding of the year, but nothing ever goes to plan in Carsely. Agatha must investigate when her ex-fiancé’s fiancée is murdered the night before their wedding.

episodes.name: There Goes the Bride (2)
episodes.overview: Having lost their lead, Agatha and the gang return to the list of suspects. Could Eirwen’s death be linked to the family business? Or were her two prior fiancés involved?
